panel.name: body
panel.component:
Layout Developer Toolkit
Part of the Developer Community within the Rennder Platform.

Version 1.9 released May 5th, 2011

Download the Layout Developer Toolkit v1.9

The toolkit comes with a demo layout, full documentation in HTML format, and an application that allows you to compile RML code to help you debug the output HTML.

NOTE: Before diving into your creative mind to design a Rennder web site, first read the documentation
            that comes with the toolkit.
